short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your tasks whenever you open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever loose track of things to do at work?

Todo List adds a simple list which is to the new tab page.
You can add and remove your tasks on new tab page itself.
This app increases productivity significantly and helps us to remember our tasks.

New feature in v2
 - History panel for traking of tasks done in the pas
